name: BASEMENT (itch) (Harpchiefone)
description:
Your dad  told you to grab something from the basement. It's been a while since you  last went down there. So many sad memories.... memories of a better life. A life before grandma died. A life where your father still cared. A life where you still had a mom...

You turn around and notice that your father locked the door behind you, leaving you to face these memories head on.

This is a teaser for a future project

Play time: 2-5 min

art by  -Zane E. B.

Gameplay by -Initial Recovery Studios
